AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: destination to pick up commercial equipment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location where an immigration checkpoint is situated
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that denied Raymond McMillon's motion to suppress evidence and reviews factual findings for clear error and legal conclusions de novo, also involved in Luis Pena's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court: recognized the constitutionality of suspicionless routine vehicle stops at immigration checkpoints
